normalized: if you harboured a yearning for the inhuman, if you wanted guidance to a world where demons live…
this place was nothing more than an entrance to that hell.
that arena was now dominated by roars and cheers.
in the deep darkness of the arena, where the lighting had been turned off, kiryuu chuckled to himself.
the audience's anticipation was at its peak.
they were waiting eagerly, and that went for kiryuu as well.
he was yearning impatiently for this.
the lights came on, and the cheering heated up even more.
who would play the leading parts in today's game?
they were waiting eagerly to see the fate of the person who had gone up onto the stage.
now, one figure was before their eyes.
one of the leading parts of today's main event.
the figure who appeared on the stage was…

name: kiryuu
normalized: all the audience have been waiting for a taimanin.
kiryuu, who had gotten up on the stage with murasaki, called off the restraints of her mind and body via the tumour.
while blinking her eyes due to the strong lighting that had suddenly shone on her, murasaki looked in the direction of the voice.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you slept in pretty late, didn't you?
murasaki immediately averted her eyes from kiryuu, her cheeks tinged bright red.
immediately after that severe torment, kiryuu had manipulated the tumour to take away murasaki's consciousness.
for murasaki, it was like standing in this spot the moment after she had climaxed hard and lost consciousness.
even though her exhausted body had recovered, the lingering feeling of being sadistically toyed with was still vividly roiling within murasaki.

name: murasaki
normalized: more than that, what do you intend to do after this…?
she still didn't quite understand kiryuu's aim.
did he intend to make her fight somebody here?

name: kiryuu
normalized: i don't intend to make you fight.
kukuku… this is your reward, murasaki!
your reward for working hard as a slave prostitute yesterday…
waving his doctor's coat, kiryuu looked at murasaki's face and lifted the edges of his mouth.

name: kiryuu
normalized: starting now, i'm going to let you meet sakura.

name: kiryuu
normalized: here's the entrance of the leading part…!
kiryuu raised a hand high up towards one corner of the arena.
the spectators' excitement had increased all the more as sakura was pulled into the arena on all fours by a chain.
the legs of murasaki, who was about to start running immediately, suddenly stopped.
still blindfolded, sakura uneasily turned her face towards her surroundings.
there were no major wounds on her body, but.
sakura, with whom she had been reunited in the depths of hell of the chaos arena, had, on her arms, legs, and neck…
murasaki's shoulders trembled, and that shaking immediately travelled along her entire body.
murasaki's eyes, which had been opened wide in shock, focused on sakura…
on all five of those body parts…
metal rings had been fitted, casting a dull shine.
murasaki looked back at kiryuu, making such an angry voice well up that it drowned out the cheers and made her hair stand on end.
grinning, kiryuu bent his thin body into a く shape.

name: kiryuu
normalized: that's a better reaction than i expected!
trusted me to keep a promise with the likes of you?!
reaching this point, knowing that she had been tricked by kiryuu, knowing that she had been made to dance atop kiryuu's palm from the beginning, murasaki howled in anger and despair.

name: kiryuu
normalized: even idiocy has its limits, immortal taimanin!
is your head as empty as your body is strong?!
under the strong lighting, kiryuu waved his arms and legs around as he heaped scorn upon murasaki.

name: kiryuu
normalized: why have you been brought to this place?
opening her eyes wide, murasaki shifted her gaze from sakura to the sold-out audience seating.
each of the individual cheers, which surged around like a storm, like a rumble in the ground, reached murasaki's ears.

name: kiryuu
normalized: what all the ladies and gentlemen are eagerly waiting for…!
looking up to the heavens, kiryuu cleared his throat and announced…

name: kiryuu
normalized: beginning after this, it's the main event!
and the sister of the most hated among them… it's taimanin asagi's sister, sakura's explosion dismantling shooww!
together with kiryuu's loud announcement, the excitement of the arena reached its peak.
murasaki immediately started running towards sakura.
murasaki's body suddenly stopped on the spot, as if roots had grown from the soles of her feet.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you'll watch your best friend die from having her arms and legs blown off in a ringside seat, right in the arena…!
kiryuu twitched his nose, seeming satisfied by the franticness of murasaki, who shrieked out her old friend's name.
originally, he had planned to take a little more time, and drive murasaki's mind to complete despair, but…

name: kiryuu
normalized: looks like it's going well, huh?!
furthermore, after this, sakura's cruel death would add to that, and would drop murasaki's mind even deeper into despair.
once that happened, it would be complete.
he could conceal himself inside the body of murasaki, whose mind would be broken, and survive…

name: kiryuu
normalized: so, murasaki, i'll ask you for the hell of it…

name: kiryuu
normalized: in what order should i blow her up?
or, shall i do them all at once…?
confident of victory, kiryuu twisted his face into a joyful expression as he approached murasaki.
murasaki was just staring at sakura in a daze, and chattering her teeth, without noticing that kiryuu had entered her field of vision.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you don't have to break yet!
anyway, after this comes the main event…

name: ingrid
normalized: this plebeian show ends here, kiryuu sabato!
this time, it was kiryuu's turn to be surprised.
the stadium was in an uproar again due to the sudden intrusion of ingrid, who was the knight of edwin black, the proprietor of the chaos arena.

name: kiryuu
normalized: uhh, i wonder what business you have in a place like this, ingrid-dono?

name: ingrid
normalized: hmph… your luck has come to an end, hasn't it, kiryuu sabato?
ingrid made the armed soldiers that she had brought with her spread out around kiryuu, and directed an aggressive smile at him.

name: ingrid
normalized: your betrayal of our organization, and your rebellious intent towards our master, black-sama, are already clear!
ingrid made kiryuu's betrayal clear, in a voice that would make the audience understand as well.
that kiryuu had obtained edwin black's cells, used them as experimental materials, and, moreover, leaked his research data to hostile organizations…
the audience were unable to take their eyes off the new show that had suddenly started.
they were exchanging looks, whispering to each other, and bending forward to watch the fate of the traitor, kiryuu.

name: ingrid
normalized: it would be good if you were arrested without any fuss.

name: ingrid
normalized: if you could, i'd appreciate it if you would resist.

name: kiryuu
normalized: uh, that is certainly a line a criminal would say, but…
kiryuu asked, feigning calm despite the cold sweat soaking his back.

name: ingrid
normalized: a few stubborn ones are in la-la land about now.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you tampered with my subordinates' minds?
shit, to tamper with the brain of a researcher… barbarian woman…!

name: ingrid
normalized: i have neither the time nor a soft-enough heart to be selective in my means of erasing lowlives.
ingrid and the soldiers were slowly contracting their ring around kiryuu.

name: murasaki
normalized: hmph… looks like you've lost your standing.
murasaki, who had been standing perfectly still nearby, regained her sanity, and made a wry laugh that hid her dark enthusiasm.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you're making a face that looks like you're saying “it serves you right”…
kiryuu could do nothing but grind his teeth… however.
kiryuu stared at murasaki, then suddenly nodded.

name: kiryuu
normalized: as you see, i'm in a desperate situation.
but, murasaki, there's also a dilemma for you and sakura.
murasaki turned her eyes toward sakura, and that instant…
kiryuu set off the explosives in the amputation shackles.
sakura's limbs were cut off, sent flying, and scattered around the arena by the four amputation shackles (excluding the one on her neck), which had all gone off at once.
having lost her arms and legs, sakura fell face down in the middle of a sea of blood, and didn't even twitch.
murasaki held her head in both hands, let out a startling scream, and tried to crumple down on the spot, but her body…

name: kiryuu
normalized: whoops, don't faint or anything, okay?
through the tumour's control, kiryuu forcibly made murasaki's body stand back up.
kiryuu walked up to murasaki, who was standing upright, and whispered into her ear.

name: murasaki
normalized: guu, how could, how could you…!

name: kiryuu
normalized: incidentally, murasaki, by coincidence, i am a “demonologist”.
if i worked on injuries that bad, i could easily put her back the way she was.
yeah, she would definitely be saved.
due to her shock and hatred, and the words “be saved”, which had been suggested by the culprit who had tried to cause sakura's death, murasaki stared at kiryuu, confused.

name: kiryuu
normalized: if i'm killed by ingrid here, sakura will definitely die.
the only one who can save her is me.

name: kiryuu
normalized: to make ingrid speechless, to get out of this place!
having watched the pair's exchange, ingrid sneered, unable to hold back.

name: ingrid
normalized: you seek help from a taimanin?
having been driven into a corner, did you finally lose your mind, kiryuu?

name: ingrid
normalized: supposing that woman also goes crazy and tries to cooperate with you, you think the likes of a taimanin who doesn't even have a weapon can win against me?
ignoring ingrid's words, kiryuu spoke more vehemently to murasaki.

name: kiryuu
normalized: will you, i and sakura survive, or will we three all commit suicide together?!
murasaki, who had opened her eyes wide in astonishment and not moved one bit, cast them toward the ground.
a voice that seemed to have been squeezed out escaped from murasaki's lips.
due to this unexpected development, ingrid widened the distance from her opponents, took a defensive posture and watched the pair closely.

name: kiryuu
normalized: well, what you have to do is simple… accept me.

name: kiryuu
normalized: your body and my mind… let my power combine with yours!
that's the reason for the tumour i implanted in you!

name: murasaki
normalized: i, i don't understand what you're saying…!

name: kiryuu
normalized: calm down and think about it, okay?

name: kiryuu
normalized: that's the trick… if you show even a little intent to resist, the fusion will fail, and i will die.

name: kiryuu
normalized: empty your mind and body so i can “enter” them.
he whispered, drawing even closer to murasaki, who was still rigid.

name: kiryuu
normalized: that's right, desire me, want me.
being forcibly kissed by kiryuu, murasaki made her shoulders jump.
a mere moment, not even a few seconds.
the bodies and minds of the two people overlapped.
